data.title: Environmental Compliance
data.text:
Kyndryl Solutions Private Limited deals with provision of Managed Infrastructure services (MIS) to its customers. MIS refers to the business of the infrastructure services unit of IBM India’s Global technology services (GTS) segment. This includes the security, regulatory and risk management services, and identity management services offerings of the Security services unit of IBM's cloud and cognitive software segment. However the public cloud platform offering of the Infrastructure service unit is not a part of it.

Company's Vision

“Our vision is to be the leading company that designs, runs, and modernizes the critical technology infrastructure of the world's most important businesses and institutions, ultimately powering human progress."

Kyndryl will participate in a PTB and Recycling program globally. Within India, Kyndryl has selected www.earthsenserecycle.com to manage the collection and recycling of products which have become E-Waste. Neither Kyndryl nor Earth Sense Recycle will charge a collection or recycling fee during this process.

It is important to note that the transportation of this E-Waste to collection centres is the responsibility of the asset owner. Please follow the directions provided below to return your products, peripherals, and accessories for recycling.

For convenience, Earth Sense Recycle Pvt. Ltd will offer special at-door collection services on a limited number of cases and may do so at a charge to the customer.

A. For high end products such as servers and storage products contact us here:

To coordinate collection pickup CALL: 18004190161 / 09676931233

Start here: Earth Sense Pvt. Ltd: www.earthsenserecycle.com or by Email: balajichowdhary@earthsense.in

B. Individual consumers (household) start here: For low end products such as personal computers, laptops, notebooks, printers and related peripherals and accessories:

Start here: Earth Sense Pvt. Ltd: www.earthsenserecycle.com or by Email: nibu@earthsense.in

To coordinate collection pickup CALL: 18004190161

The following is a list of collection centres where you can drop off your E-Waste, including batteries.

Collection Centre Details

Customer can proceed with these details for end of life equipments: Earth Sense Recycle Pvt. Ltd:- https://www.earthsenserecycle.com or by Email: john@earthsense.in To coordinate a special door-to-door collection pickup CALL: 18004190161

The following is a list of collection centres where you can drop off your E-Waste including batteries
